title: Budget 2026: India to raise defence spend by 15.3% to Rs 7.84 lakh crore after a year of Pakistan war
desc: India's defence budget for FY27 surges to ₹7.84 lakh crore, a 15.3% increase, emphasizing 'Make in India' and self-reliance. Driven by Operation Sindoor, domestic defence production hit record highs, with exports also soaring. Reforms like DAP 2020 and DPM 2025 streamline procurement, boosting indigenous platforms and combat readiness.

title: Fil-Chinese Athletic Association cagefest tips off
desc: Four teams, led by title favorites St. Stephen’s High School and Xavier School, begin their campaigns as the newly introduced 30-39 years-old division of the Smart Sports Fil-Chinese Athletic Association Inc. fires off Monday, February 2, at the Tanduay Gym in Quiapo, Manila.
